Package space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.proxy

package space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.proxy
Provides makers to rapidly create proxy class with minimal effort, using codes similar to the following: 

 ProxySpec spec = ProxyMaker.byAsm().make(cls, interfaces, handler);
 ProxyClass ac = spec.newInstance();

Utilities:

  • ProxyKit
Core interfaces:
  • ProxyMaker
  • ProxySpec
  • ProxyHandler
  • ProxyInvoker
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    space.sunqian.fs.dynamic
    This package and its subpackages provide varying degrees of dynamic runtime metaprogramming: DynamicKit: Dynamic utilities; DynamicClassLoader: Dynamic class loader; space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.proxy: Enables dynamic proxying capabilities; space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.aop: Enables AOP (Aspect-Oriented Programming) features;
    space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.proxy.asm
    Provides proxy maker implementations by ASM, using codes similar to the following:
    space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.proxy.jdk
    Provides proxy maker implementations by JDK, using codes similar to the following:
    space.sunqian.fs.dynamic.aop
    Package for AOP (Aspect-Oriented Programming), provides makers to rapidly create aspect class with minimal effort, using codes similar to the following:
  • Class
    Description
    ProxyException
    This runtime exception is typically used for proxy.
    ProxyHandler
    The ProxyHandler is an interface used to handle proxy behavior, including determining whether a method needs to be proxied (ProxyHandler.needsProxy(Method)) and the specific behavior of the proxy method (ProxyHandler.invoke(Object, Method, ProxyInvoker, Object...)).
    ProxyInvoker
    This interface is used to directly invoke the proxy method by.
    ProxyKit
    Proxy utilities.
    ProxyMaker
    This interface is used to create proxy class for the specified proxied class and interfaces.
    ProxySpec
    The specification of a proxy class, provides definition info of the proxy class and methods to create its instances.
